actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the percentage-of-compensation limitation on employee stock ownership plan contributions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the annual amount which an employer may contribute to an employee stock ownership plan on behalf of an employee to 50 percent, or $25,000 whichever is less, of the compensation paid the employee.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the percentage-of-compensation limitation on employee stock ownership plan contributions.
